verbs.description: [ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] [V: attended] [ARG1: a White House event honoring Gold Star families] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-LOC: in her first appearance in more than three weeks after a kidney procedure] .
First lady Melania Trump attended [ARG0: a White House event] [V: honoring] [ARG1: Gold Star families] on Monday in her first appearance in more than three weeks after a kidney procedure .
